title: Workshop on Developing Inquiry-Based Multimedia Learning Objects for Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design inquiry questions on social issues and create at least two multimedia learning objects to address them.
Learners can develop smartphone-based learning materials integrating audio, images, and text, and suggest improvements through peer evaluation.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of their own and peers' learning objects according to project-based assessment criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
